name: SuperSnobun
description:
A birthday gift for AluriSnow featuring her original characters, Sno and Snobun! 

Throw a mochi bun into the skies and avoid all the funny projectiles in the air. Eat carrots.

Press or hold Space to jump.  A and D go left and right for all the game's menus.

Upgrades can be bought in the store!! After checking the Leaderboard, press Enter to change your name!! 

____________________

MUSIC - DOVA-SYNDROME
夏はsummer!! @ フリーBGM DOVA-SYNDROME OFFICIAL YouTube CHANNEL
